ygData.subject: RE: Anybody alive (2nd attempt - didn't get a copy first time I sent it...)
ygData.msgSnippet: I think we are all waiting with baited breath to hear something from Ester. A flurry of activity for a couple of days - then deafening silence for the next
ygData.messageBody:
I think we are all waiting with baited breath to hear something from Ester.
A flurry of activity for a couple of days - then deafening silence for the
next five...

I'd love to see some hard numbers of testing results (i.e. what resistances
she's getting). I sure hope she's testing across different levels and with
different Charisma. I sure hope she isn't using "tools" that obscure
results differently than what we experience with our characters...

Slyde
